description: Vorrs have a +8 racial bonus on Survival checks The vorr is a hateful canine of the Abyss that lurks in the when tracking by scent. shadows, waiting for its chance to lunge out and attack. A vorr stands about 4 feet tall at the shoulder and looks WENDIGO similar to a black hyena but with a much more intelligent- looking face. Vorrs are covered with bristly black and gray Medium-Size Fey (Cold) fur and have long, ratlike tails. Hit Dice:4d6+19 (33 hp) Vorrs are quite intelligent, and they are capable of hunt- Initiative:+5 ing and tracking prey over great distances. Vorrs speak Speed:Fly 120 ft. (perfect) Abyssal. description: 220 gp; Weight:1 lb. ANATHEMA CHARACTERS An anathema’s favored class is cleric. Like other yuan-ti clerics, anathemas worship Merrshaulk and can choose any two of the following domains: Chaos, Evil, Destruc- tion, and Plant. Because of its numerous special abilities, an anathema PC’s effective character level (ECL) is equal to its class level + 28. Thus, a 1st-level anathema cleric has an ECL of 29 and is the equivalent of a 29th-level character. 195 ANATHEMA YUAN-TI Yuan-ti anathema YUGOLOTH Climate/Terrain: Any land and underground (Hades)

description: — into its host’s body (not just ingested poisons), protecting its host from any ill effects. An Abyssal relative of the tapeworm, the gutworm is a vile fiend that lives in its host’s digestive system. It appears as a Soul Tick 1-to-2-foot long segmented worm of deep purple color, Fine Outsider (Evil, Extraplanar, Lawful, Symbiont) dripping with thick yellowish slime. It has bulbous red Hit Dice:1/4 d8 (1 hp) eyes and a toothy maw. Unlike a tapeworm, it does not Initiative:+3 attach itself to the intestinal wall, but swims freely around Speed:5 ft. within the digestive tract, creating an uncomfortable sen- AC:21 (+8 size, +3 Dex), touch 21, flat-footed 18 sation in the host. Base Attack/Grapple:+1/–20 Gutworms do not speak, but they understand Abyssal. Attack:Bite +12 melee
